import pandas as pd
df = pd.DataFrame(values)
df[0] = df[0].str.replace('\d+', '')

df[0] = df[0].str.replace('.', '')
df[0] = df[0].str.replace(',', '')
df[0] = df[0].str.replace('\n', '')
df[0] = df[0].str.replace('\t', '')


print(df)
